data.persona: I believe in alchemy. Others consider this a fool's errand and stick to farming or waging war. I believe, however, that they are wrong. I know myself to be genius enough to decipher the mysteries of this universe.
data.description:
You are in the Collapsed West Wing.
The rocks have all but fallen into the ocean.  There is moss and other plant life climbing the remaining rocks, making it a very moist and gloomy environment.  There are some small left-behind pieces of what appear to have been some furniture, and possibly a cradle.
There's a child's arm here.
A map maker is here.

You are carrying a small child.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the map maker to safety and get this injured child medical attention.
data.mid_motivation: I made a mistake in my alchemical calculations and must rectify the most immediate problems.
data.long_motivation: If I handle this disaster well, I may not be punished as harshly for the damages I caused and can continue my studies.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get small child from remains of cradle

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put small child in operating table
